name: EBALDC VITA
fullDescription: East Bay Asian Local Development Corporation (EBALDC) offers free tax preparation through the VITA program at their SparkPoint Oakland center.
whatTheyOffer:
- Free tax preparation
- Federal and state returns
- Help with tax credits (EITC, CalEITC)
- IRS-certified preparers
- Multilingual assistance available
howToGetIt:
1. Email sparkpoint@ebaldc.org for information
2. Check website for current year schedule
3. Make an appointment when available
4. Bring required tax documents
5. Complete your tax filing
